name: ❖ Robotic
des: ➣ This is a Robotic Manufacture website.Home page have a Header, Banner,Partner, Product, Business Summary, why choose us, Benefits, Fututre of Robotics, Review, Book Consultation and Footer.
➣ If a user is logged in, they will able to purchage product.
➣  If a Admin is logged in, they will see Dashboard, where he/she can make Admin. Admin can add a new product. And on the Manage product, an admin can delete any product.
➣  Firebase authentication setup.
➣  Implement JWT token and Payment Gateway(stripe).

name: ❖ Health Solution
des: ➣ This is a Teeth dental website.Home page have a Header (simple navbar), Banner,Testmonials, Services,Contact, and Footer.
➣ If a user is logged in, they will able to book appointment.One user can book one treatment in a day on time.
➣  If a admin is logged in, they will see Dashboard, where he/she can make Admin.Admin can add a new doctor. And on the Manage Doctors page, an admin can delete any doctors.
➣  Firebase authentication setup.
➣  Implement JWT token and Payment Gateway(stripe).

name: ❖ Manufacture Plant
des: ➣ This is a tools manufacturer website.Home page have a Header (simple navbar), Banner, Tools/Parts, Business Summary, Reviews, and Footer.
➣  If a user is logged in, they will see on the header My Orders, Add A Review, My Profile.

➣ If a admin is logged in, they will see Dashboard, where he/she has ability to add new products, remove existing products, remove user products, update shipping status, and create new admin accounts.
➣  Implement payment get way and Firebase authentication.

name: ❖ Power Zone
des: ➣ Geym website with dynamic functions and responsive design.
➣ Allows user to create an account, book packages, add custom packages, and delete them.
➣ Google firebase authentication has been added.
➣ Reviews are dynamic.

name: ❖ Moon-Tech
des: ➣ This is a small tech website.
➣ Here you can add product,delete product,and update product.
➣ Also here a user can filter and  sort the product.
➣ The main perpous to make this website implement the Redux-toolkit.

name: ❖ The Beer House

➣ Used fancy carousel & hosted on netlify

name: ❖ Personal Blog
des: ➣ This is a personal blog website.
➣ Here you can read blog, add blog ,delete blog,and update blog.
➣ Also here a user can filter and  sort the blog.
➣ The main perpous to make this website implement the redux-thunk.
